#Pre-Processing on Speech Text

import re
import string
from string import punctuation
import nltk
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

stopword = stopwords.words('english')

def text_preprocessing(x):
    text = re.sub("joe biden.*\n","",x)
    text_ = "".join([ch if ch not in punctuation+"’" else " " for ch in text])
    text = " ".join([w for w in text_.split() if len(w) > 1 and w not in stopword])
    return text
